title: Senior Product Designer
text:
• Created 3D renderings in Vectorworks to visualize event layouts and ensure accurate AV and staging execution.
  • Designed scenic elements integrating brand colors and messages to enhance presence and engagement at expos.
  • Collaborated with teams to debug and optimize a logistics app, improving tracking of event components like LED walls and lighting.

title: Creative Director
text:
• Led brand identity creation, including logo design and website refresh, to boost recognition and user experience.
  • Redesigned loan application UI/UX, increasing customer approvals and conversions by 20%.
  • Developed and maintained a design system in Figma, ensuring consistent brand assets across digital platforms.

title: Sr. Front-End Developer/Experience Designer
text:
• Led UX design for Aon's tech incubator team, creating intuitive user experiences for business-facing apps in collaboration with data scientists, project managers, and digital designers.
  • Developed interactive UI designs in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD; transformed concepts into code-based prototypes to demonstrate functionality and user flow.
  • Conducted A/B testing to optimize user experience and drive improvements across Aon's extensive application ecosystem.

title: Art Director, Web Developer, Sr. Experience Designer
text:
• Led a team of 5 UI/UX designers in creating mobile ad campaigns for major brands, boosting CRM growth with targeted SMS marketing.
  • Oversaw development of interactive mobile experiences like games and trivia, enhancing user engagement and brand loyalty.
  • Managed end-to-end creative processes for high-impact campaigns, integrating brand messaging with mobile technologies.
  • Collaborated with developers and marketers to turn creative concepts into functional web apps, optimizing campaign performance.
